TopicTitle: What do you want to see in .23

Articles.Content: Parts parts parts parts parts! I wanna see 3.75m parts! It would help cut down on the "build it wide" spaceships (since each fuel tank would have 3x the capacity).
Performance. It's annoying when one can't do a really epic mission because the game becomes a slideshow.

There's a mod that contains welded parts, removing the need to use so many struts. I'd like to see welding brought in, where you can take a subassembly and invest research and/or money and produce a welded part.
Multiplayer:D

i would like to see more on.

Bugfixing

more Parts for SpaceStations

more plantes

Caves to go and exporer.
I would like a better aerodynamic model.
Structural parts!
Stuff that builds on the new stuff in 0.22 that we haven't had a chance to work with yet since 0.22 hasn't been released.

Scorch marks on aircraft when they enter the atmosphere.

More rover parts.

More science to do.

Honestly for me I would like to see these things in no particular order.

-FAR Aerodynamics become the stock aerodynamics

-Kethane and ISA added to the game

-an option for Deadly Re-entry effects.

-costs and funding to career mode (even though I will likely only play sandbox)

-Option to randomize planet types in system on sandbox mode or career mode.
More planets and celestial bodies!!!!!!111
Finish IVAs and start implementing some cash.
Automated laser monkeys.
Resources And at least one more planet/moon. And of course resource-related science.

Automated laser monkeys.
And projectile acid fish.
i want see .22 first TY

Re-entry heat damage would be my #1 wish for .23 - once that comes in, I think it will dramatically change missing planning (for the better/more interesting). Also, I recall hearing from a KSPTV broadcast last weekend that some additional performance optimizations would be coming in the version following .22 - I'm looking forward to that too.
- Stock parts for ressource gathering / fuel crafting. Much like the kethane mod.
More planets, money and/or resources.

1.) Re-entry that is more than cosmetic.

2.) Fairings and Drag.

3.) More and Different Parts.

4.) More places to go.

In much that order.
Id like Kethane assimilated into vanilla

I'd like Kethane assimilated into vanilla

It's called resources.
Resources is my #1 wish.

Better aerodynamics and money!

Thumbs up for that!!!!

Hmm

Some better texture for ground

Some other stars with planets and stuff around for interstellar adventures

Oh yes resources also
